CREATE_ABSENCE: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ABSENCE (ID INTEGER, MINUTE INTEGER, HOUR INTEGER, DAY INTEGER, MONTH INTEGER, YEAR INTEGER, ASSIGNMENTID INTEGER, STUDENTID INTEGER);
CREATE_APPSETTINGS: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS APPSETTINGS (SCHOOLNAME TEXT, SCHOOLLOGOURL TEXT);
CREATE_ASSIGNMENT: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ASSIGNMENT (ID INTEGER, CLASSROOMID INTEGER, SUBJECTID INTEGER, TEACHERID INTEGER);
CREATE_LISTITEM: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {table_name} (ID INTEGER, LABEL TEXT, LABELEN TEXT);
CREATE_STUDENT: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS STUDENT (ID INTEGER, FIRSTNAME TEXT, LASTNAME TEXT);
CREATE_STUDENTCLASSROOM: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS STUDENTCLASSROOM (STUDENTID INTEGER, CLASSROOMID INTEGER);
INSERT_ABSENCE: INSERT INTO ABSENCE (ID, MINUTE, HOUR, DAY, MONTH, YEAR, ASSIGNMENTID, STUDENTID) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
INSERT_ASSIGNMENT: INSERT INTO ASSIGNMENT (ID, CLASSROOMID, SUBJECTID, TEACHERID) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?);
INSERT_STUDENT: INSERT INTO STUDENT (ID, FIRSTNAME, LASTNAME) VALUES (?, ?, ?);
SELECT_ABSENCE: SELECT ID, MINUTE, HOUR, DAY, MONTH, YEAR, ASSIGNMENTID, STUDENTID FROM ABSENCE;
SELECT_ABSENCE_ITEMS: SELECT S.ID, S.FIRSTNAME, S.LASTNAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ABSENCE AB WHERE AB.ASSIGNMENTID = ASS.ID AND AB.STUDENTID = S.ID AND AB.DAY = STRFTIME('%d','now') AND AB.MONTH = STRFTIME('%m','now') AND AB.YEAR = STRFTIME('%Y','now')) AS ABSENCES FROM STUDENT S JOIN STUDENTCLASSROOM SC ON S.ID = SC.STUDENTID JOIN ASSIGNMENT ASS ON ASS.CLASSROOMID = SC.CLASSROOMID WHERE ASS.ID = ?;
SELECT_ASSIGNMENT: SELECT ID, CLASSROOMID, SUBJECTID, TEACHERID FROM ASSIGNMENT;
SELECT_ASSIGNMENTS_FOR_TEACHER: SELECT A.ID, CLASSROOM.LABEL || ' - ' || SUBJECT.LABEL AS LABEL, CLASSROOM.LABELEN || ' - ' || SUBJECT.LABELEN AS LABELEN FROM ASSIGNMENT A JOIN CLASSROOM ON A.CLASSROOMID = CLASSROOM.ID JOIN SUBJECT ON A.SUBJECTID = SUBJECT.ID WHERE A.TEACHERID = ?;
SELECT_STUDENT: SELECT ID, FIRSTNAME, LASTNAME FROM STUDENT;
SELECT_STUDENTS_FOR_ASSIGNMENT: SELECT S.ID, S.FIRSTNAME, S.LASTNAME FROM STUDENT S JOIN STUDENTCLASSROOM SC ON S.ID = SC.STUDENTID JOIN ASSIGNMENT A ON SC.CLASSROOMID = A.CLASSROOMID WHERE A.ID = ?;
